original: 在汜水關前，各路諸侯豪傑大戰華雄未果。袁術恐先鋒孫堅立下頭功，不發糧草，以至孫文台兵敗汜水關。
text: Before the Bangshui Pass, the battle between the heroes of the lords and Huaxiong failed. Yuan Shu feared the pioneer Sun Jian to make the first contribution without giving out grain and grass, and even Sun Wentai was defeated at Bangshuiguan.
